definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: rottenness, decay (always fig.);—´[[ר]]: abs.; appar. of ravages of worm, in [[בֵּית יְהוּדָה]], in fig. Ho 5:12 (‖[[עָשׁ ]]), cf. Job 13:28 (‖ id.); elsewhere of decay of bones, caries (in fig.), ´[[בְּעַחְמ]] :´[[ר]]: Hb Hab 3:16, Pr 12:4, cstr. ´[[רְקֵב עַחְמ]]: Pr 14:30.
